description: Advance contract award notice for an AMSCO^ 250LS Public Steam Sterilizer.
full_summary:
**Tender No: WS4483620054**
**Title: ACAN_K8B13-240392 - Sterilizer**
**Issued by:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of **Department of the Environment (ECCC)**

**Open for Tender: N/A**
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-11T14:00:00 (EST)
**Region of Delivery:** Paradise and Mount Pearl

**Goods/Services:**
The Department of the Environment (ECCC) intends to purchase one (1) AMSCO 250LS Small Steam Sterilizer from a qualified supplier.

**Key Delivery Dates:**

* Delivery on or before **September 30th, 2024**

**Procurement Method:**
The Government of Canada will award the contract based on the lowest price.

**Important Information:**

Please be advised that this Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is not an invitation to tender. All required supporting documentation must be submitted by the closing date to be considered.

**Note:**
All interested parties must register for a SAP Ariba account and complete their Government of Canada profile to access and download the ACAN and attachments.

**Related Documents:**
The ACAN and attachments can be accessed via the following URL: `https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19164898?extsite=MTkxNjQ4OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==`

**Contact Information:**
For any further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact Hassen Aroune at **hassen.aroune@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

**Requirements:**
**Bid Submission:**
Electronic bids must be submitted by 2 PM EST on April 11th, 2024. Supporting documentation required. Late bids will not be considered.

**Governing Laws:**
This tender is governed by the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

*UNIFIED PROCUREMENT DATA IS PROVIDED AND WILL BE USED TO VERIFY OFFER PRICE AND OTHER PROPOSAL ELEMENTS. Please ensure that the bid submission process and contents comply with this file format to avoid processing delays.*
(End of Unified Procurement Data Line) 
This notice, including attachments, is provided to eligible tenderers by the SharePoint Document Library. 
PSPC911E stands right at the bottom left. The applicable here privacy notice calls completion and variable belonging. Mandatory extractables
